Reviews.Title: Poor video
Reviews.Author: Joseph Dibacco
Reviews.Content: The video quality is nothing like said in the advertisement. The adjustments in the on screen menu do nothing to improve it. I tried low, medium and high quality settings. I tried different resolutions and still the video is very grainey. I am sending it back.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: CMN
Reviews.Content: So not worth it. The video is such poor quality! It's hard to make out what your watching and very difficult to use. Save your money!
